thread.title: Military Drills in Indian Ocean Signal Deepening Ties
thread.title_full: Military Drills in Indian Ocean Signal Deepening Ties - WSJ

author: Gordon Fairclough
title: Military Drills in Indian Ocean Signal Deepening Ties
text:
NEW DELHI—Warships and aircraft from the U.S., India and Japan practiced hunting enemy submarines during wide-ranging exercises in the Bay of Bengal over the weekend, signaling the three powers’ deepening ties as they contend with a more assertive China.
Worries about Beijing’s rapidly increasing military strength and its growing ability to deploy forces far from Chinese shores have helped drive a convergence of strategic thinking in...
